singleItemContent: Have you ever sent handmade gifts to other?
Have you ever received a great gift?
Do you think you are good at choosing gifts?
Describe a time when you had a problem with using the computer
You should say: When it happened
And explain how you solve the problem at last.
What do people use computer for
Should students be allowed to use computers at school?
What do you think of people who are addicted to playing computers?
Do you think computer s make our life simpler or more complex?
Why do people often have problems when using new products?
